text: Nebatɨn otarim, Atrivim Jeroboam arazir kuram gamizɨ moghɨn, Joahas arazir kuram Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn a gami. Jeroboam fomɨra Israelia gekuizɨ, me arazir kuraba Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn dagh gami. Ezɨ Jeroboam amizir arazir kaba, Joahas datɨrɨghɨn arazir kamaghɨra garibagh ami, egha da ataghizir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ.
